data.name: MEDIC
data.description:
## What Is MEDIC (MDIC)?
Medic is an online healthcare platform built for the future. Medic aims to provide widely accessible, quality healthcare at an affordable cost. Our mission is to give our users access to healthcare providers, and healers around the world to support them on their journey to holistic health. We also provide a platform to build communities around specific diseases and disorders to help people connect and share their experiences along the way while receiving education on the matter. Medic utilizes the most cutting-edge technologies combining the Internet of Things for real-time data collection, blockchain technology to safely store all data collected, and machine learning for efficient data resolution.

MDIC is the native utility token that is used for:

Percent-Based Fee Discount for transactions on Medic platform.
Access to MEDIC membership program
MDIC mining and staking
Patient Data Access
Ticket to Project Eureka

## How Many MDIC Coins Are There in Circulation?

The Medic economic model has a limited supply that starts at 3686044 MDIC. The maximum supply can never exceed 121,719,930 MDIC, but this number will decrease as more transactions happen on Medic platform.

Medic’s native token was first made available for purchase through a strategic sale, in which 1% of total token supply was on sale. 

## Who are the Founders of MEDIC?
MEDIC was co-founded in 2020 by Dr. Jee Hoon Ju, Dr. Jon Kolbeinn Gudmundsson, Min Kook Kim, Daniel Ry, James Yoon, Ragnar Árni Ágústsson, Óskar Kristjánsson, and Prabhudev Patil as a solution to the emerging problems of traditional healthcare industry after COVID-19. 

As a group of medical doctors and health professionals, they have seen firsthand some problems with today’s medical system:

Every healthcare provider uses a different database to store patient data, making patients susceptible to unnecessary, expensive investigations while also delaying the diagnostic decision-making process.

Online healthcare and wellness solutions are virtually inaccessible.

Healthcare providers spend an overwhelming amount of time on routine tasks.

Malpractice due to human error is prevalent.

Healthcare services lack consistency across regions and even providers.


## What makes MEDIC unique?

MEDIC – Online platform where healthcare and wellness providers can freelance to meet market needs. MEDIC is an online B2C marketplace where global citizens can access quality healthcare services for general well-being. Our approach to care is holistic at its core, focusing on the health of body, mind, and soul.

Chartchain - Secure and verifiable blockchain-based patient data storage model that eliminates privacy concerns. Chartchain unifies the patient data storage models in all affiliated hospitals and clinics.

ViCloud – Our exclusive software to connect existing IoTenabled medical devices on the market gives doctors access to real-time patient data via streaming. ViCloud is a powerful tool that not only provides convenience to healthcare providers but also collects a massive amount of data remotely, which will be stored securely in our Chartchain.

SUJIN – AI-based virtual diagnostic assistant for healthcare providers. SUJIN will learn from the data stored on Chartchain to assist healthcare providers with their diagnostic process and help reduce human error. With SUJIN’s prediction model of suspected diseases based on algorithmic thinking, healthcare providers will be able to reduce their risk of malpractice. Moreover, thanks to AI, SUJIN will be capable of processing quantities of data that would previously have been unthinkable, and its complex data analytics model lets it see data that a human might fail to observe.

Project Eureka - The exclusive funding platform of MEDIC. We plan to use Project Eureka to discover and accelerate other unique projects out there with a vision to solve global problems. On top of our mission to provide wide-ranging access to quality healthcare, we hope to help others who are helping humanity through the growth of science and technology.
